title: 414 : Bachelor Nation Break Ups + Getting to Know The Bachelorettes!
itunes:title: 414 : Bachelor Nation Break Ups + Getting to Know The Bachelorettes!
description:
Today The Broads are diving into Bachelor Nation news - the break ups, the babies, the weddings, and a whole lot of tangents! Then they take some time to find out more about our upcoming Bachelorette’s Gabby and Rachel and discuss some surprising news about this new season!

 

Join in The Broad’s donation match to the Midwest Access Coalition here: https://www.gofundme.com/f/midwestern-residents-access-abortion-care

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***NATIVE: Go to NATIVEDEO.COM/CHATTY or use promo code CHATTY at checkout to get 20% off your first order!

***MATCH: Right now, messaging your top matches is free! Download Match today to get started, you never know who you might meet!

***FAHERTY: Use code CHATTY at FAHERTYBRAND.com/CHATTY for 20% off!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
